activation.condition: Strike a second target with the Cleave feat.

description.value:
You can strike many adjacent foes with a single blow.

Prerequisites: Str 13, Cleave, base attack bonus +4.

Benefit: If you strike a second target with the Cleave feat, you can spend 1 Resolve Point to make a melee attack against each subsequent foe that is both adjacent to the last target and within your reach, as long as you hit the previous foe. You canâ€™t attack an individual foe more than once during this attack action.

target.value: 1 target within reach and adjacent to last target hit.
